document_data.name: Adjatha
document_data.mainbody: '''Adjatha the Drinker''' was a [[magic]]al [[longsword]] with a powerful life-stealing [[Item enchantment|enchantment]].
document_data.Powers: This ''+2 [[longsword]]'' healed the wielder every time it struck an opponent. In addition, it granted them immunity to any ''[[charm]]'' and ''[[Dominate person|dominating]]'' [[spell]]s and effects.
document_data.History:
This blade was once owned by a servant of the [[deity]] [[Bhaal]], [[Dabber]], who led a cadre of minions. Whenever he returned from battle with even the slightest of injury, Dabber considered it a failure of his subordinate officers. He punished them with regular assaults while wielding ''Adjatha'' until he was fully recovered from his wounds.

At some point, the [[sword]] came into the possession of the [[cambion]] known as [[Warden (Planar Prison)|the Warden]] of the [[Planar Prison]] that appeared in [[Athkatla]] in the year [[1369 DR]].
